name: the geo brothers
description:
Game: The geo brothers are a duo of Italian squares that you play as. Pick a side to be on either red or blue. Start running to the boxes on the sides of the level once you start the game. Drag the boxes to the highlighted squares to score points.

Story: Join the geo bro at work to decide what to do with these crates. Giovanni and Antonio sit there bored thinking about what they want to do. They think about making shapes. so that's what they

button setup:

player 1

WASD keys to move

Q to choose a shape

E to place down the crate

player 2

ARROW KEYS to move

M to choose a shape

SPACEBAR to place down the crate
